text: Andre Devell Spencer (July 20, 1964 - August 4, 2020) was an American professional basketball player. He played for three teams in the NBA. From 1992 to 1994 Spencer played for the Atlanta Hawks, Golden State Warriors and Sacramento Kings during his brief NBA career. Spencer was born in Stockton, California. Spencer died on August 4, 2020 at the age of 56.Former player Andre Spencer dies at 56 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Andre Spencer
